lead_paragraph: There is heavy disappointment in Joe Gibbs’ latest run with the Washington Redskins, the team he led to three Super Bowl titles in the 1980s and 1990s.
snippet: There is heavy disappointment in Joe Gibbs’ latest run with the Washington Redskins, the team he led to three Super Bowl titles in the 1980s and 1990s.
